"""Check that the three-arms cases with integer and float payoffs in exploration phase return the expected arm allocations."""
epsilon = 0.7
total_samples = 10
equal_allocation = 1.0 / 3
for historical_info in [self.three_arms_test_case, self.
    three_arms_float_payoffs_test_case]:
    bandit = self.bandit_class(historical_info, epsilon, total_samples)
    assert bandit.allocate_arms() == {'arm1': equal_allocation, 'arm2':
        equal_allocation, 'arm3': equal_allocation}
